biography.biography_specialization: UX & UI Designer / Front-End Web Developer / Game Developer
biography.text1: Hello! I'm a self-taught front-end web developer based in Venezuela. I enjoy designing and building things with the computer such as Web Technologies and Games.
biography.text2: I started working as a freelancer several months ago, helping people from all over the world to create their website with React.js technology.
biography.text3: In my spare time I like to learn new things that can help me become a better programmer or dedicate myself to working on my personal projects.
biography.text4: I have many hobbies like playing videogames, chess, speedcubing and aeromodelling design.

education.academic_alma-mater1: National Experimental University of the Armed Forces
education.academic_alma-mater2: South China University of Technology（华南理工大学）
